```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)

library(trntools)
```

```{r}
# create data set.
x <- matrix(0, nrow = 3, ncol = 5,
            dimnames = list(
              paste0("R", 1:3),
              paste0("G", 1:5)
            ))
x["R1", "G1"] <- 1
x["R1", "G2"] <- -1
x["R2", "G1"] <- 1
x
```

```{r}
g <- trn2tbl_graph(x)
plot_trn(g, "circle")
```
